title: Severe performance degradation after updating to macOS Sierra
body:
On El Capitan, LoL would run fine (50-60 fps) on my 2012 Macbook Air at Medium-Low settings.

After updating to Sierra, FPS dropped down to 50 at idle, <20 during teamfights. 

I've tried reinstalling the game using the Hextech Repair tool and it seemed to help a little. [Here's a link to the logs](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26372267/LoL%20Logs.zip). Please help!

replies.body:
Since the final build of macOS Sierra has been out for less than a week, there are bound to be performance issues. There are some steps in our [Mac FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) that may help, but we're still looking into the macOS changes.

Let me know if you have any questions.
